Description: Mensura Health is an early-stage company dedicated to finding practical solutions for rapid and accurate therapeutic drug monitoring.
Full Description: Mensura Health is an early-stage company dedicated to finding practical solutions for rapid and accurate therapeutic drug monitoring (TDM) of small molecule drug levels at the point of care (PoC). In diseases where TDM in patients can dramatically improve the effectiveness of existing medications, the availability of highly accurate, rapid PoC options can greatly contribute to amelioration of morbidity and dramatic improvements in quality of life for patients. The initial focus of the company is on epilepsy. Mensura Health, Inc., was founded several years ago by a small group of academic, biotech industry and finance professionals dedicated to improving PoC TDM. Our detection platform employs electrochemical-based biosensors using cutting-edge aptamer technology.

Description: Cyber Trust Alliance simplifies compliance in an affordable and achievable subscription model.
Full Description: 50M+ patient records were breached in the US in 2021 costing the industry an estimated $25B+.  According to the Office of Civil Rights, most if not all of these breaches could have been avoided or significantly mitigated if healthcare organizations would implement the HIPAA Security Rule; and yet, over 60% of healthcare organizations in the US fail to meet the minimum requirements of HIPAA.  Utilizing our CEBA Risk Management SAAS software platform and proprietary Virtual Telassessment technology, Cyber Trust Alliance simplifies compliance with and implementation of HIPAA in an affordable and achievable subscription model.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Health Care, Information Technology, Software

Description: Moving airports into the digital era. Modern Apron Software Solutions.
Full Description: We've helped numerous airports modernize gate & landing management and eliminate revenue leakage! At GoApron we strive to give our customers what they value the most and that’s time. Working with airports our team and I learned quite some time ago that airfield operations at airports and specifically aircraft parking is being done in an old-fashioned way.  Today, operators are still parking planes with a pen, paper, fax, spreadsheets, and pdfs. All while having to manage their apron responsibilities such as airfield safety, monitoring maintenance work, weather conditions, runway conditions, and communicating with Air Traffic Control.  Additionally, airfield operations specialists are spending time throughout their day and night shifts taking phone calls from airlines and ground handlers to manually allocate gate assignments for day use and RON parking.  We provide software solutions that helps airports park airplanes smarter, save time, forecast scheduling, and increase revenue.  We're helping airports move into the digital era.
Headquarters Regions: Greater San Diego Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Science and Engineering, Software, Travel and Tourism

Description: The world's most advanced automatic vape cartridge filling system, using machine vision learning and software.
Full Description: Founded in May 2019, Vape-Jet merges a pharmaceutical-grade fluid handling system with advanced machine vision alignment. Software driven design allows for precise tuning on every aspect of operation, and full web capability allows you to control the system via any internet-enabled device. Configuration profiles can be easily created, updated and saved for different product types, allowing for quick and easy batch changes. Three independently controlled heat zones provide stable and precise temperatures, ensuring reliable and accurate fluid dispensing. Individual cartridge fill data reporting with photo verification provides traceability and quality assurance. Machine vision alignment allows fills direct to shipping trays, without the need to transfer into a jig. Our expert team of in-house engineers are available for support via live-chat, phone, and email. As your company and goals evolve, we will adapt with your vision. We create customized support and maintenance packages to align with current initiatives, and future growth. Vape-Jet is cash flow positive and profitable in 2020, approximately a year after inception.

Description: TrustWare provides a non-custodial crypto vault that ensures secure and recoverable transactions.
Full Description: TrustWare is a blockchain-based platform that offers a secure, recoverable, and non-custodial crypto vault for users. With TrustWare, users can store their digital assets securely, without the need for a third-party custodian. The platform is designed to ensure that users have complete control over their assets, while also providing advanced security features such as multi-signature authentication, decentralized key management, and cold storage. In addition to its crypto vault, TrustWare also provides a social network environment where users can connect and share value with one another. The platform facilitates peer-to-peer transactions, enabling users to exchange digital assets and other forms of value with friends, family, and other members of their social network. TrustWare is committed to providing a user-friendly and accessible platform that makes it easy for anyone to manage their digital assets securely and to participate in the emerging world of decentralized finance. By leveraging the power of blockchain technology, TrustWare is helping to create a more secure and transparent financial system that puts control back into the hands of users.

Description: Omaha Productions is an entertainment company.
Full Description: Omaha Productions, founded by Peyton Manning, has rapidly emerged as a prominent media enterprise. In 2020, Josh Pyatt and Jamie Horowitz presented Manning with a compelling pitch to start a media company. Initially hesitant, Manning recognized the potential in their proposal: the ability to run a media company from his Denver home, with the freedom to explore diverse subjects beyond football. Thus, Omaha Productions was born. Within just two and a half years, Omaha Productions has become a media powerhouse. The company produces several shows for ESPN, including the popular "Peyton's Places" and the highly acclaimed "Manningcast" - an alternate broadcast of Monday Night Football where Manning engages in real-time discussions with his brother Eli and various guests, including Barack Obama and Tom Brady. Omaha Productions also works on projects for Netflix and Amazon Prime Video, in addition to earning substantial revenue from commercials for clients such as Bush's Beans, Caesars Entertainment, and Nationwide. Omaha's growing portfolio of content has attracted attention from media investors, who recognize the potential of the company. Seeking a partner to enhance his storytelling ambitions, Manning teamed up with media investor Peter Chernin, known for his early investments in successful ventures like Hello Sunshine, Barstool Sports, and Crunchyroll. Chernin's expertise and guidance will contribute to Omaha's goal of creating inspiring and inclusive content for diverse viewers. As Omaha Productions continues to flourish, Manning relinquishes his role as the quarterback on the field to become the offensive coordinator of his expanding media empire. With a sharp focus and a commitment to quality, Manning has transitioned seamlessly into the world of media, successfully establishing Omaha Productions as a prominent player in the industry.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio

Industries: Agriculture, AgTech, Farming, Finance, Financial Services, FinTech, Impact Investing, Information Technology, Social Impact
Description: AgroFides is an AgTech and FinTech firm dedicated to supporting farmers in developing countries secure capital and services.
Full Description: We provide two distinct but related services to impact lenders and farmers. Our services include assessing farmers' creditworthiness and offering lenders the opportunity to loan to creditworthy farming operation(s).  AgroFides is a business development and capital resourcing partner. We leverage technology and agricultural expertise to assess creditworthiness and support small and medium-scale farmers in developing countries and emerging markets secure capital and services.  We assess the creditworthiness of farmers by addressing the five key components of credit. We evaluate the character of farmers and their seriousness about their farming operation(s). We then assess the capital that the farmers have invested in their farming operation(s). We consider all collateral available for a potential loan. AgroFides consider the borrower's capacity to repay a loan and finally ensure that the condition, that is, the terms of the loans are appropriate. The information from the five Cs is used in developing multiple models making up the FidesScore. We provide the Fides Score to lenders in order to help them identify which farming operation(s) to lend to.  What is a Fides Score?  The Fides Score is a platform for collecting and analyzing pertinent data about farmers in order to generate a "trust" score for the farmers. The Fides Score is more than an analytical tool; it comprises the process that ensures proper client selection and appropriate loan size to meet farmers' needs and potential.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Financial Services, Information Technology, Lending and Investments, Other, Social Impact
Founders: Acheampong Atta-Boateng, Acheampong Atta-Boateng, Michael Hickey, Prince Boateng

Description: Element Zero is a not-for-profit next generation payment network based on an algorithmic stablecoin creation platform.
Full Description: Element Zero is a not-for-profit next generation payment network based on an algorithmic stablecoin creation platform. Element Zero enables businesses, organizations and even governments to create their own stablecoin--free of charge--based on a new stability methodology that completely eliminates the possibility for any volatility in the first place. Element Zero stablecoins deliver a new payment solution built for tomorrow’s digital world strengthening customer and community relationships while protecting both the consumer and merchant from some of the most challenging scenarios that are insufficiently addressed by payment systems available today.  Element Zero provides a truly decentralized and stable coin that is designed with the hope of making the world better for all by protecting against long-term inflation and eliminating the possibility for any volatility in the first place. Element Zero will not distribute any profits and keep 100% of the revenue in the organization’s reserve to support the liquidity of the stablecoins. The control over Element Zero will be shared with all users in such a way that every essential decision will require agreement by consensus.

With a one-time membership initiation fee of $249 a member is granted access to: a reduced ride fare on all Bentley and Maybach vehicles, a members-only car share marketplace and family sharing. Family sharing enables a Goldsainte member to add additional family members to their membership plan for only $12/month per additional member (maximum of two).  Riders who prefer to ride without a membership are charged an additional $49 per hour on all Bentley and Maybach vehicles in addition to a 25% service fee. The Goldsainte experience for all riders includes the ability to customize every aspect of the ride from curated music playlists on Spotify, Apple and Sirius XM to preferred temperature settings, complimentary food and beverage options, preferred driver requests and an all-inclusive perks bag that allows users to select essential items of their choice at no additional cost. Riders are given the option to book rides as a single ride, a round-trip or an hourly experience. An hourly experience provides riders with their own personal driver and comes standard with the ability to make as many stops as the rider chooses and change stops on the go with the comfort of knowing that the driver will wait at each location until their journey is complete.

Description: Midcontract provides secure service contracts with payments split into incremental and upfront installments, as well as escrow.
Full Description: Midcontract acts as a financial intermediary (arbiter) for clients, agencies, and freelancers from service industries, providing contracts with payments split into incremental and upfront installments, all backed by Escrow.   • Why It Matters: Regardless of how clients, freelancers, and service delivery companies conduct business, all parties face regular financial losses due to non-payments, delayed payments, and ever-growing freelance marketplaces fees  • What's our Secret Sauce: Midcontract will be the only platform out there, offering 100% Escrow for all contract types, as well as fiat and crypto support, combined with the extreme speed of money delivery (5x faster than Upwork, 8x faster than in paper contracts). Additionally, they offer revenue share for every user, and low fees compared to marketplaces.  Example Use Case for core functionality: Imagine a freelancer, Alice, who agrees to a design project with a company, XYZ Corp. They use Midcontract to create a contract with specific milestones. Upon contract initiation, XYZ Corp deposits the agreed amount into an escrow account. As Alice completes each milestone, the smart contract on the Aptos network verifies the completion and releases the corresponding payment from escrow to Alice. This process ensures that Alice is paid on time for her work and XYZ Corp is assured of receiving the agreed-upon services, with all transactions securely recorded on the blockchain. How It Works in Practice: Contract Creation: Users create a digital contract outlining terms, milestones, and payment details. Escrow Service: Funds are securely held in an escrow account until contractual conditions are met. Payments: Upon milestone completion, payments become available to be released from escrow to the freelancer. Dispute Resolution: In case of disputes, the platform offers mechanisms for resolution based on the contract terms. I n essence, Midcontract makes remote work transactions transparent, efficient, and secure, leveraging blockchain's capabilities to provide an unmatched service in the freelance and service delivery markets.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services

Description: We are launching our edtech SaaS platform to provide students with adaptive learning experiences, starting with our AI powered SAT course.
Full Description: Jump Start Tutoring is an award-winning educational company that makes learning easy. We support students in grades Pre K through 12 with in home and online, private tutoring services. Our top tier instructors pinpoint academic strengths and weaknesses and create personalized educational plans for students. Specializing in assessment testing, educational consulting and career development, we don't just help students study for a test. Jump Start Tutors nurture students with holistic learning practices, enabling them to achieve their dreams. Our flagship SAT Program currently boasts an average increase of over 180 points, saving local families hundreds of thousands of dollars on college tuition costs. As the cost of college has increased over 20% in the last ten years, the average graduate owes $32,700 before starting their first job. Although SAT prep is key to college entrance and scholarship funding, the average cost for private tutoring is between $45- $125 per hour.  To make test prep more accessible, affordable and effective, we are expanding our services to include education technology software products- that do not require the assistance of a private tutor. ​Our goal is to redesign our SAT program with AI/ML technology to provide students access to a highly effective and adaptive learning experience. Our product will be cost friendly and will lead to higher test scores with shorter prep time. In the future, our edtech SaaS platform will expand to include more tailored learning courses highlighting test prep, career exploration and emotional wellness courses.

Description: Partnering with cities to deliver the next generation of open and ethically managed traffic data.
Full Description: Hannah Systems’ mission is to deliver open and anonymous traffic data, never utilizing personal information, bringing focus to the most important tasks at hand, reducing emissions, improving congestion, and ultimately changing the way we live. Hannah Systems is making a difference in a progressive and socially beneficial way and we are emphasizing this objective by becoming a Public Benefit Corp. Hannah is a B2B software company that creates openness and the democratization of data, free from the location-based advertising business model.  The Hannah Systems AI was developed by a team of PhDs and traffic engineers and provides detailed intersection data, resulting in a more comprehensive view of the city leading to less time spent in traffic.  At Hannah Systems we enhance traffic data with AI technology and share this anonymous data via our open data platform. This enriched information enables analysis of traffic patterns and pedestrian activity, and reduces travel time, pollution, and congestion. Hannah Systems’ enhanced data can help cities redesign light phasing and surface new routes that can genuinely improve travel times. Traffic information is the catalyst that can bring about change, however, data has become increasingly more personalized and is a protected and proprietorial asset that it is not being utilized to help our cities. The Hannah Systems detailed traffic information makes travel more efficient, reducing the stress and anxiety of city driving, reducing emissions and making roads safer. The Hannah Systems open data platform is the foundation for companies looking to improve pedestrian safety, reduce emissions, streamline traffic and address the needs of the AV industry. Hannah Systems is partnering with cities around the globe in order to deliver the next generation of open, anonymous, and ethically managed traffic data. Hannah provides a deep understanding of congestion problems through advanced analytics, microsimulation of every intersection, a macro view of the overall city and the Hannah Systems’ Traffic AI.

Description: Venture studio specializing in helping resilient entrepreneurs #GoGlobal
Full Description: For too long self-motivated entrepreneurs have navigated the minefield of challenges to launching a global company with very little support. The last thing you should bet on in this situation is an unproven team that you don’t trust. GSD Venture Studios travels the world inviting resilient teams to establish partnerships that ensure organizations grow the right way, without games or gimmicks. Unlike traditional investors, we take senior operational (often co-founder) roles in these companies, capitalizing on our trusted reputation, experiences and network to drive explosive growth. We Travel The World Investing In Resilient Teams Bold Enough To #GoGlobal For companies to leave a lasting impact they must grow quickly, be bold and go global. In order to do so,  companies must engineer five things simultaneously: Product, Investment, Influence, Sales/Marketing, and Systems. Benchmarks for future funding rounds must be developed through all five lines of effort. We rarely find companies that are effective at all five, mainly because each line requires a tremendous amount of back office expertise and support. This is why we have partnered with top law firms, banks, coworking spaces, HR professionals and strategists to ensure your success. How We Get Shit Done For organizations seeking digital transformation or looking to increase their startup engagement, GSD Venture Studios is developing a collision point with key organizations and officials across the world.  We invite corporate partners, accelerators and other experts for idea collaboration, building relationships with our portfolio and helping launch new companies. You Have an Idea, We Make It Global

Description: Health & Wellness, Mobile App, SaaS
Full Description: A peer-to-peer health and wellness content marketplace. While our target user is the average performer (interested but challenged to meet their health and wellness goals), our market entry point is through independent health coaches (personal trainers, nutritionists, and mental health coaches). The fully developed and on-market mHealth platform empowers these coaches to run small businesses (think Etsy x Instagram x Whoop) for their clients. Our growth strategy is highlighted by micro-community migrations: existing health coaches will bring their clients onto the platform. Once on the platform, the users (clients) will experience a unique journey beyond consuming coaching content. It promotes community and accountability in an effort to break the health management cycle of the average performer: start, stop, start, stop. Ultimately each user and cohort establishes and manages three health scores: Activity Score, Accountability Index, Health Accountability Index Score (HAIS). The mHealth Market was estimated at $54.25B in 2021 and is expected to grow to $243.57B by 2030 with a CAGR of 18.2%.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Content and Publishing, Health Care, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Other, Software, Video

Description: Event Horizon Telescope is a planet-scale array of eight ground-based radio telescopes forged through international collaboration
Full Description: The EHT is an international collaboration that has formed to continue the steady long-term progress on improving the capability of Very Long Baseline Interferometry (VLBI) at short wavelengths in pursuit of this goal.  This technique of linking radio dishes across the globe to create an Earth-sized interferometer, has been used to measure the size of the emission regions of the two supermassive black holes with the largest apparent event horizons: SgrA* at the center of the Milky Way and M87 in the center of the Virgo A galaxy.  In both cases, the sizes match that of the predicted silhouette caused by the extreme lensing of light by the black hole.  Addition of key millimeter and submillimeter wavelength facilities at high altitude sites has now opened the possibility of imaging such features and sensing the dynamic evolution of black hole accretion.  The EHT project includes theoretical and simulation studies that are framing questions rooted at the black hole boundary that may soon be answered through observations.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Events, Media and Entertainment, Professional Services

Industries: Consumer Research, Elder Care, Electronic Health Record (EHR), Health Care, Health Insurance, Insurance, Personal Health, Wellness
Description: Giving patients all of their health and insurance data in one place to save time, organize, AND use with algorithms to cut their spending.
Full Description: SnapHealth is a Benefit company that gives patients all of their health and insurance data in one system. Then, with a business analytic layer, matching data is run through algorithms to make recommendations both efficiently and timely.  The team has spent 10 years on the ground manually matching health system and insurance data directly with patients to make prudent recommendations around better quality and lower-cost healthcare. For the first time, due to interoperability and patient access regulations, we are compiling methodologies that draw on both parts of the system to make for a better patient experience.  // MILESTONES 2018 - Started R&D and Customer Discovery 2020 - Met with Health and Human Services (CMS/CCIIO Innovation Day) about interoperability/patient access 2021 - Participated in Ben Franklin Techcelerator 2021 - Participated in Pennsylvania Insurance Department Keystone Quickstart Program 2021 - Received Ben Franklin Grant 2022 - Filed as B-Corp 2022 - Rolling out MVP later this year //PLATFORM FOCUSES Cover - Before the cost of healthcare can be driven down, the needs of 160 million consumers who don't have access to employer coverage must have an objective source to get care. SnapHealth algorithms use health history, active medication lists, and income reporting to screen for prudent solutions and allow them to enroll right within the system. Compare - Between Health Equity, Rural Health needs, and Seniors with Caregivers trying to manage aging in place, SnapHealth will provide independent guidance on the most efficient methods to navigate healthcare. A patient must consider health networks, medical vendors, medication manufacturers, and programs available from their insurance, hospital, and government. SnapHealth will help sift through these programs and give patients access to tools ranging from Case Manager offers to Social Determinants of Health Programs. This is crucial when more seniors are aging in place. Response - As an untethered platform, the patient decides who and what can use their data. With deidentified records, we are looking to aggregate data in ways that would improve outcomes between the Opioid Crisis, Pandemic Response, AI interpretation of clinician natural language, and Clinical trials by using macro-level datasets. Outcomes - Feeds from NIH and other resources within trade groups and trusted health systems will advise patients on preventative care recommendations and outstanding screenings that are shown to be missing from the patient data on the platform. Circle - governance policies allow extended family, immediate family, and caregivers different levels of access and/or notices per your specific direction. Patients decide who knows what, and when. SnapHealth manages compliance and matching programs to ensure patient data is protected and shared ONLY at the direction of the owner of the data: the Individual. With patients as stewards of their own healthcare, SnapHealth is driven to accelerate change in the markets.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Design, Financial Services, Health Care
Founders: Aislinn Sutcliffe, Erika Hollingsworth, Joshua Brooker
Top 5 Investors: Ben Franklin Technology Partners of Central and Northern Pennsylvania, Joshua Brooker

Description: A Crypto asset rating agency, based in the US
Full Description: Crypto Asset Rating Inc. (the “CAR INC”) is a FinTech company driven to plug the gaps in the crypto market and bridge the governance institutions with the existing and new thought leaders of the crypto industry.The crypto industry holds invaluable opportunities towards exponential economic growth through financial inclusion and participation of the masses. A new world is being born out of the reinvention of the financial systems built on unprecedented technological advances. And the Company is already in play to reap the benefits for its investors. As complex as the Company’s products and expertise are, the business model is simple, sustainable and highly profitable. All offered services are for profit—subscription-based models but are customized to each product line. This hedges the Company’s risk and also allows for identification of the most profitable revenue model, with the flexibility of replicating it. The Company has the experts and has developed unparalleled crypto market solutions. Now, the Company is rapidly acquiring customers. With a comprehensive Go-To-Market plan and an exhaustive Marketing strategy already in play, the Company has leveraged its technical expertise towards data analyses and automation to allow its subject experts to continuously innovate them using machine learning algorithms. The Company already has exciting products in the pipeline: Crypto Index, Crypto Sovereign and ETF Rating platforms, and more. In parallel, it also has a geographic expansion strategy in place—furthering financial inclusion. The Company’s leadership is made of technology and finance leaders with a combined experience of 200+ years—in entrepreneurship and intrapreneurship. And the Company’s team is first and foremost passionate about Blockchain technology and its applications. We are the only ones in the industry with such holistic product offerings built on total compliance. It is exciting to bring our solutions and structure to this nascent industry and are confident that it will soon be shaping governmental and institutional policies. The Company is destined to be a change leader and wants you to join this exhilarating journey. We have developed solutions to resolve the four key challenges of the crypto industry: 1. Minimal Regulatory Oversight: Crypto Asset Rating Platform (CARP), an Independent Structured Rating Agency, comprehensively rate crypto assets for Institutional and Retail Clients. The Company developed custom rating algorithm to conduct an exhaustive multi-layered evaluation across 125 parameters from 15 categories and appraisal against four distinct risk buckets—business, financial, legal and technology. 2. Illiquid Asset Market: Tokenization Asset Platform (TAP) is a Software as a Service (SaaS) tokenization platform that offers the process of creating, issuing, managing and converting an asset to digital securities programmatically on Blockchain in a more restrictive and compliant way by embedding the logic in Smart Contracts. TAP also allows an issuer to create securities under various jurisdictions in a compliant way with a lock period, define vesting schedules, configure transfer and selling restrictions for inside and outside the exchange in accordance with regulatory rules, investor whitelisting, perform KYC and AML checks, digital securities recovery process, provide dividend distribution of tokens and conduct a voting event for shareholders. 3. Trusted Community Deficit: The Company’s quality content knowledge platform, Crypto Business World (CBW), is the one-stop-shop for all updates in the crypto market. It integrates in-house and external content to deliver subject matter across all platforms—news and articles, videos and podcasts, analysis reports and press releases. Additionally, it incentivizes industry experts to publish verified content on CBW through its ‘Content Marketplace’ feature. Thus, a trusted community (External Analyst-EA) is being developed. The Company developed a custom profile and consensus algorithm to nurture the trusted community. 4. Lack of Knowledge: The Crypto Training Platform (CTP) aims at leveraging experts and specialists from all of the Company's products, and their knowledge, to deliver Massive Open Online Courses (MOOC) and learning platforms and partnerships. This platform is a personal dream of the CEO and is currently under development.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Information Technology

Description: MedTech startup developing an automated IVD medical device for detecting and identifying all human pathogens & AMR genes on one test panel.
Full Description: PathoGene, Inc. is a private, seed-stage precision MedTech startup headquartered in Los Angeles, with R&D operations located in Monrovia, California. We are developing a sample-to-answer in vitro diagnostic medical device that detects and identifies all known microscopic human pathogens along with their antimicrobial resistance profiles on a single 6-hour test panel. To do this, we leverage robotic automation, third-generation DNA and RNA sequencing, and cloud computing technologies to report a molecular diagnosis to care providers and disease surveillance systems in real-time. Our goal is to deliver the necessary diagnostic tools for doctors and medical staff to make optimal treatment decisions that can ultimately improve public health as a whole, and we believe that our sample-to-answer technology can become the global standard of care for diagnosing infectious diseases.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US

At 502 Health, we are committed to revolutionizing the healthcare landscape by providing unparalleled transparency and accessibility through our innovative e-commerce platform. Our mission is clear: to empower consumers with the knowledge and tools necessary to make informed decisions about their healthcare expenditures. Through our platform, customers gain access to a comprehensive array of healthcare products and services, all meticulously curated to ensure both quality and affordability. Our commitment to transparency extends beyond mere pricing disclosures; we provide a platform where customers can access genuine reviews, fostering trust and confidence in their healthcare choices. Furthermore, 502 Health goes beyond traditional offerings, unlocking access to products and services that were once out of reach for many consumers. By eliminating barriers and leveling the playing field, we strive to enhance the overall healthcare experience for individuals and families alike. In essence, 502 Health represents more than just an e-commerce platform; it embodies a commitment to fairness, transparency, and empowerment in healthcare. Description: Eventador provides secure ticket distribution services that utilize transaction data to make events safer, more transparent, and less costly
Full Description: Eventador is providing technology to vendors / hosts to make events more secure, transparent, and enjoyable for attendees. For the first time, tickets can be tracked and have a communication pipeline available to performers or event hosts / venues. Eventador is introducing new tools and security measures for the event industry.  Given current ticket platforms, tickets cannot be tracked from initial purchase to redemption, which means that some vendors have no idea who is attending their events. With Eventador's blockchain and smart contract implementation solution, all ticket transactions are recorded on a blockchain ledger. Therefore, since the Eventador Wallets are KYC / AML, vendors now know exactly who has purchased, resold, or redeemed a ticket (SEAT).

Description: Tivid Technologies, Inc. is the first independent film distrubution technology that focuses on content creation offering 100% royalties.
Full Description: Tivid TV is a revolutionary 360° evolving ecosystem that provides a platform for learning, filming, distributing, and more. Founded in July 2019 by film producer Christopher Bowers and his wife McKenzy Bowers, Tivid TV has rapidly grown into a prominent self-distribution over-the-top content platform headquartered in Orlando, Florida.  It has introduced innovative opportunities for young artists, filmmakers, and content creators to profit from their projects without the challenges of unattainable distributor payout goals. Overview  Tivid TV distinguishes itself from other self-distribution platforms by offering a remarkable 100% royalty-based model, allowing content creators to retain a higher share of their earnings. This unique approach sets Tivid TV apart and has attracted a large community of independent movie makers and television show producers eager to showcase their work to a global audience. The platform utilizes cutting-edge streaming video on demand (SVOD) technology, providing a seamless and immersive viewing experience for its users. Tivid TV can be easily accessed through popular app stores like Google Play, Apple Store, and Roku TV, making it convenient for viewers to watch their favorite content on various devices. Recognition and Achievements The platform has gained significant media attention and recognition in the industry. Some of its notable achievements and features include: Stevie® Award Winner: In the 2023 American Business Awards®, Tivid TV was honored as a Silver Stevie® Award Winner in the Business Service Industries category, specifically for Startup of the Year. Media Features: Tivid TV's success has been highlighted in prestigious publications such as Fox News, the Business Journal, and Black Enterprise Magazine, showcasing its impact on the world of independent content creation. Trademark Registration: The Tivid TV logo is a registered trademark with the United States Patent and Trademark Office. It successfully navigated a public opposition with TiVo Corporation, allowing the logo to go live and be in use. In January 2022, Tivid TV took another innovative step by launching Tivid TV Studios, a dedicated production studio equipped with pre-fabricated movie sets. This move aimed to further support content creators by providing them with a professional space to bring their visions to life. Tivid TV Studios has opened up new possibilities for creators to enhance the quality of their productions and expand their creative horizons.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, East Coast, Southern US

Description: A nonprofit on a mission to make nutritious food accessible for all
Full Description: Wellfare is a nonprofit based in New York City on a mission to make nutritious food accessible for all. The Better Box from Wellfare is the first free food program in the country focused on improving access to convenient nutrition in low-income communities. Each box is filled with over $200 worth of premium, nutritious and convenient packaged groceries like low-sugar beverages, functional bars and high-fiber snacks donated from a growing roster of the best natural food brands. Every month, enrolled households pick up their reserved Better Box from a distribution outpost in the community. Our unique program gives food-insecure families an opportunity to access unaffordable, better-for-you alternatives that drastically curb sugar, salt and fat intake. In communities where generational chronic health conditions are the norm, the Better Box is helping thousands take positive steps toward a more nutritious and sustainable lifestyle.

Description: Pixel8earth is building a crowdsourced and perpetually updating 3D map of the world for machines+humans.
Full Description: Pixel8earth is building a crowdsourced and perpetually updating 3D map of the world for machines+humans. We fuse computer vision and geomatics to enable commodity video and photos to generate georeferenced 3D point clouds and meshes. This allows multiple high-volume data sources to be utilized to generate and perpetually update 3D maps of the globe. The accuracy of the 3D maps to a survey baseline is 25-50 cm RMSE absolute accuracy. Visual Positioning Systems (VPS) operating from feature databases generated by the 3D maps have ~2m location accuracy and within 6.25-degree rotational accuracy.

Description: TimeSTAMPED & independently verifiable PHOTOS and VIDEOS that can be used as an evidence of anything - b2b, b2c, b2b2c - in any industry
Full Description: SHORT DESCRIPTION: Mobile application & website: TimeSTAMPED & independently verifiable PHOTOS and VIDEOS that can be used as an evidence of anything - b2b, b2c, b2b2c - in any industry. www.trumania.net WHAT IS DOES> Trumania App makes photos and videos, puts a timestamp on it containing an ID, date, time, and location. When you click "save" Trumania uploads your media file to its servers and since then, this file is an independent proof of what was taken on it and proof that no editing was applied. Trumania takes photos and videos the way your phone's camera sees and doesn't allow the photo or video to be edited, modified or faked. If someone wants to verify the authenticity of a photo or video, just search the ID in the app or on our website. Real Opportunity (a). The management of large businesses loses control of processes when the company structure becomes too large. Relevant for 30 percent of companies. (b). Insurance companies can’t completely get rid of fraud with policies, both with corporate clients and with private ones. Actual problem for 70 percent of companies. (c). Construction companies cannot maintain and track the quality, timing, and volume of work on all construction projects. Relevant for 20 percent of companies. (d). The medical sector cannot control and verify prescriptions and attach them to a specific doctor. All 100 percent of doctors should do this. (e). Buyers of products on online marketplaces and social networks can never be sure that they will receive exactly the product they ordered. And it's almost impossible to prove a discrepancy.This results in a 20 percent increase in negative reviews each year. (f). Dating sites are completely discredited by the craze for editors and filters. You will hardly recognize someone you met on a social network. Up to 70 percent of users should use Trumania app. (g). State corporations are increasingly faced with fraud and product inconsistencies in public procurement. Relevant for 70 percent of government purchases. (h). Future partners can't register their agreements officially in the absence of lawyers next to them, thus in 30 percent of cases they suffer from non-compliance with agreements in the future. (i). Benefactors and patrons do not have the opportunity to check and verify the intended use of funds, time and location. 100 percent use cases.  (j). Compliance with quarantine regulations (stay at home), in the context of the growing threat of the spread of Covid'19. 100 percent of cases. (k). Banks do not have up-to-date and honest information about collateral for loan portfolios. This problem is relevant for inspection bodies in 30 percent of cases. Value Proposition A. Trumania Value: (a). You can make photos and videos that are 100 % true. They cannot be falsified. (b). For businesses, this is a real opportunity to save money on inspectors and inspections and to control the workflow. This is applicable for 50 percent of companies. (c). For a combination of business and private relationships, this is an opportunity to make sure that any circumstances have occurred in real. Applicable to 30 percent of cases. B. Trumania Results: (a). Any person or internal system can make sure that this photo or video has not been edited or any transformations in terms of what is recorded on them or regarding the date, time and location, (b). The system always stores the original photo or video for verification. (c). Trumania is an independent system that can be trusted. (d).Trumania allows you to save at least 50 percent on the intermediate level of inspection bodies. Solution and Innovation (a). Trumania uses standard components of user’s phones and allows you to take pictures as users are usually used to doing. This is implemented with the next prime iterations: (*). The camera in the app takes pictures as they are and does not allow you to replace or edit the captured image in any way. (*). The photo or video is stamped with the identification number, date, time, and location of the shooting. (*). The app does not have access to the phone's gallery and thus it is impossible to substitute another object. (*). Photos and videos are stored separately from the information stamp, which makes it impossible to falsify. Description: Nanotransfer develops gene delivery systems, based nanotechnology
Full Description: Nanotransfer develops delivery systems, based on inorganic nanoparticles, with several benefits: Ready-to-use: clients just have to produce the genetic material and choose a suitable Nanotransfer system to integrate it with the gene. Versatility: they can be used to transport different types of nucleic acids. Biosafety: they are non immunogenic, any patient can be elegible and re-administration is possible. Specificity: They can be specific for a cell type. Scalable and low-cost production. High levels of cellular internalization. Nanotransfer delivery systems have a chemical affinity for the phosphate backbone, common to all nucleic acids, so the integration of the gene with the delivery system is independent of its sequence. We can decouple the synthesis of the delivery system and that of the geneof interest, which will allow a greater number of therapies to be developed with a positive impact on people´s health. Our non-viral delivery systems are unique not only because they are non-toxic and non-immunogenic but also becasue of their composition and surface properties. Due to their composition, our delivery systems can escape the endosome and avoid enzyme degradation. The surface properties can be tailored to target specific cells.

Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Industries: Biotechnology, Health Care, Medical, Medical Device
Description: Obstetrx creates a uterine tamponade device to eliminate maternal death and disability from postpartum hemorrhage.
Full Description: Obstetrx creates a uterine tamponade device to eliminate maternal death and disability from postpartum hemorrhage. In 2014, RevMedx, Inc. developed the XSTAT® hemorrhage-control device in concert with the US military to stop severe bleeding from non-compressible wounds suffered on the battlefield. They soon realized that this type of traumatic bleeding, which XSTAT has been proven successful in treating, is highly analogous to postpartum hemorrhage. Inspired to address this global issue in women’s health, the team quickly got to work adapting the combat medicine technology for an obstetric application. RevMedx partnered with a team from Oregon Health & Science University, who received a Saving Lives at Birth Grand Challenge grant to conduct early-stage research and development. This work culminated in a pre-clinical proof-of-concept study.  With the inception of Obstetrx, Inc, a pilot clinical trial was performed in Zambia in 2019. Today, Obstetrx is a privately-held company based in Wilsonville, OR.  We are currently working toward regulatory clearance and commercialization of our novel uterine tamponade device in the US and across the globe.
Headquarters Regions: West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: Oatmeal Health is an AI-Enabled, Value-Based Lung Cancer Screening as a Clinical Service for FQHCs and Health Plans
Full Description: Mission  Oatmeal Health's mission is Empowering Health Equity Through Cancer Screening and Early Detection for marginalized communities. Problem Statement 1 in 2 men and 1 in 3 women in our families will receive a cancer diagnosis during their lifetimes. Unfortunately, 50 percent of these diagnoses occur at a late stage, where survival is at its lowest. We are changing this. Who is Oatmeal: Oatmeal Health is an AI-enabled specialty cancer screening as a Service focused on providing early-detection, health equity, and care coordination services for Federally Qualified Health Centers (FQHCs) and Health Plans. We are fundamentally changing the lives of marginalized communities through early identification, preventative screening, and comprehensive high-touch value-based care services, starting with lung cancer, and then breast, colorectal, and other cancers in the future.

Description: Fully automated physician documentation using Artificial Intelligence
Full Description: Vocalto, a fully automated healthcare documentation tool, is returning humanity to medicine through the use of Artificial Intelligence.  Vocalto uses Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning to parse a conversation between a patient and their physician and create a transcript.  From this transcript, Vocalto creates a recognizable SOAP note based on the conversation.  Finally, Vocalto parses the information in the transcript and sends Medications, Allergies, Diagnoses and other data directly into the physicians Electronic Medical Record for storage.  Automating physician documentation is posed to remove dozens of documentation hours from physicians each week and bring back back the face-to-face interaction that both physicians and patients crave.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: United Way of Coastal Fairfield County is a strong community.
Full Description: Community engagement and collaboration are at the core of our efforts. We work with partners to frame conversations around critical issues to create on-the-ground solutions.  To effect long-term change, these collaborations utilize the collective impact model, a systematic approach to agreeing on the issues of concern and how they will determine success.  In Bridgeport, United Way of Coastal Fairfield County fills the critical role of a backbone organization for Bridgeport Prospers and in Norwalk, UWCFC lends its expertise to Norwalk ACTS.  Click here to read more about collective impact.

Description: We're reinventing the online store. Popup is the no-code commerce platform that lets you control the customer journey.
Full Description: Popup is a no-code, end-to-end commerce platform that is reinventing the online store. Unlike Shopify, BigCommerce and others which are based on an online store blueprint that has not changed since the early 2000s, we've reinvented the online store to empower merchants to design, control, and analyze the entire customer journey. Our modular architecture removes the need for hacky workarounds and costly apps. We simply enable merchants to do whatever they can imagine, in minutes, without any code. Popup's commerce platform is designed for small to large-sized businesses. Popup was founded in 2022 by ex-Shopify employees and is a 100% remote company.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Software
Top 5 Investors: Accel, Seedcamp, The Twenty Minute VC, Sam Parr, mu ventures
